intent.goal: Create zine-style wellness collages with radial flat-lay compositions framing central typography

content.scene_description: A flat-lay collage of wellness items arranged in a circle around the center: black over-ear headphones, a pair of black running shoes, a glass jar of bath salts, a rolled blue yoga mat, a toothbrush cup with soap, and dumbbells with a water bottle.
content.overlay_text: Headline: 'THE SELF CARE GUIDE'. Subtext: 'Our best tips, product recommendations & recipes for wellness & self love!'

style.overall_vibe: zine-style digital scrapbook, casual, textured, Gen Z wellness aesthetic

subject_style.outline: photographic cut-outs with soft purple/lilac glow creating a sticker effect
subject_style.pose_vibe: flat-lay elements forming a circular frame

illustrative_elements.doodles: thin black ink doodles (stars, spirals, scribbles)

composition.framing: radial object framing around central text
